name: Exposed To The Elements
description:
This game was created with the theme "The Elements".
in this game you play as someone who is getting "Exposed to the elements" and you can't stay out for too long or you'll die, you goal is to get into your house.

(when you are at the door of your house press W to enter it)

the game is really hard so expect to die a lot.

i also gave myself the challange of making all the main art only 4 colours (some things are not but most are)

you can wall jump btw.
